server.facade

Class AbstractServerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.facade.AbstractServerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameFacade, IGamesFacade, IMovesFacade, IUserFacade
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockServerFacade, ServerFacade

    public abstract class AbstractServerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameFacade, IGamesFacade, IMovesFacade, IUserFacade
    The AbstractServerFacade allows singleton access to a facade. This can be the real ServerFacade, or the MockServerFacade for testing purposes. This allows for Dependency injection.
    See Also:
    ServerFacade, MockServerFacade

      • setFacade

        public static void setFacade(AbstractServerFacade facade)
        Allows a MockFacade to be used in place of a real one. This allows for Dependency injection. This can be useful for testing purposes.

      • signInUser

        public User signInUser(Credentials credentials)
                throws InvalidCredentialsException
        Description copied from interface: IUserFacade
        Signs in the player with the given credentials
        Specified by:
        signInUser in interface IUserFacade
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials that the person is using to sign in.
        Returns:
        the user that results from signing in. This is used to create the client's catan.user cookie.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - if the credentials do not match anyone in the database.

      • registerUser

        public User registerUser(Credentials credentials)
                  throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                         ExistingRegistrationException
        Description copied from interface: IUserFacade
        Registers a new player with the given credentials
        Specified by:
        registerUser in interface IUserFacade
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials that the person is using to register.
        Returns:
        the user that results from signing in. This is used to create the client's catan.user cookie.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - if the credentials are invalid.
        ExistingRegistrationException - if the credentials supplied already belong to another person.

      • createGame

        public CreateGameResponse createGame(boolean randomTiles,
                                     boolean randomNumbers,
                                     boolean randomPorts,
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: IGamesFacade
        Creates a game with the given properties.
        Specified by:
        createGame in interface IGamesFacade
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - whether or not the created game will have random hexes.
        randomNumbers - whether or not the hexes in the created game will have randomly placed numbers.
        randomPorts - whether or not the created game's ports will be randomly picked.
        name - the name of the game.
        Returns:
        a CreateGameResponse with the created game's info.
